The MEME Suite

Motif-based sequence analysis tools

mhmm2html

Usage:

mhmm2html [options] <mhmmscan text file>

Description

Converts text output from mhmmscan into HTML.

Input

mhmmscan Text File

The text output from the program mhmmscan. If '-' is specified then the file is read from standard input.

Output

Output a mhmmscan output in HTML to standard output.

Options

Option Parameter Description Default Behaviour
General Options
-alphabetdna|​protein Specify the alphabet of the mhmmscan result. The DNA alphabet is assumed.
-diagram-scalescale Set the scale of the diagram. A scale of 1 is used.

See Also

The program mhmmscan, which uses this script to create HTML output.
